description: Schema defining a Participant object in a Synapse Competition.
name: Participant

userId.description: The Synapse ID of this Participant.

competitionId.description: The ID of the Competition in which this Participant is partaking.

name.description: The display name of this Participant.
name.title: Name

createdOn.description: The date on which this Participant was created.
createdOn.title: Created On

score.description: This Participant's top score for this Competition.
score.title: Score
